channel.title: Ruby on Rails development
channel.description: Recent content on Ruby on Rails development

item.description: You have an idea for a web app? Let's transform your idea into a web application. Planning, building, testing, launching, and maintaining your web application - we are there for you. Who we are We're a group of web developers. We write code for the web and make great web apps. Our goal is learn something new everyday to build even better web apps. Meet the team

item.title: About
item.description: More About Orange Iceberg. Orange Iceberg is a small web development consultancy focused on transforming our client's ideas to functional web applications. We specialize in building web applications using Ruby and Ruby on Rails. However depending on a project we often assemble and lead a team of various web professionals, with help from our associates. Why the name Orange Iceberg? An iceberg is often over 90% underwater with only tip being visible.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Get In Touch! Whether you want to find out how we can help with your Ruby/Rails project or if you just want to chat with us. We'd love to hear from you. Drop us a line to eval(decodeURIComponent('%64%6f%63%75%6d%65%6e%74%2e%77%72%69%74%65%28%27%3c%61%20%68%72%65%66%3d%5c%22%6d%61%69%6c%74%6f%3a%68%65%6c%6c%6f%40%6f%72%61%6e%67%65%69%63%65%62%65%72%67%2e%63%6f%6d%5c%22%3e%68%65%6c%6c%6f%40%6f%72%61%6e%67%65%69%63%65%62%65%72%67%2e%63%6f%6d%3c%5c%2f%61%3e%27%29%3b')) and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. item.title: Portfolio
item.description: PROJECTS These are some of the projects we worked on. Thompson Learn. Online learning environment that provides an enhanced online learning experience for teachers and students. Website: https://learn.thompsonbooks.com/ Tagged: Ember, JavaScript, Ruby, Ruby on Rails, API Client: Dream Holidays Insurance Platform for DHI partners and their agencies to automate selling travel insurance policies. Website: http://app.dreamholidaysinsurance.com/ Tagged: Ruby, Ruby on Rails, jQuery
